    • Method Detail

      • computeIDFFromCorpus

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,WordStats> computeIDFFromCorpus(java.lang.String corpusFile,
                                                                          boolean preprocess)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Computes IDF for all the words in a corpus
        Parameters:
        corpusFile - the corpus file (txt file with one tweet/doc per line)
        preprocess - text (set false is input file is already preprocessed)
        Returns:
        an hashmap where the key is the word and the value are the word stats (occurrences, IDF)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeWordStatsToFile

        public void writeWordStatsToFile(java.lang.String corpusfile,
                                 java.lang.String outputfile,
                                 boolean preprocess)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the word stats (occurrences, # of doc in which a word appears, IDF) for all the words in a corpus in a text file
        Parameters:
        corpusfile - The txt file containing the reference corpus (one doc per line)
        outputfile - The outputfile (text file)
        preprocess - text (set false is input file is already preprocessed)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
